subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jo-Jo Reyes won for the first time in 29 starts by throwing his first career complete game and Jayson Nix hit a two-run homer to lead the host Toronto Blue Jays to an 11-1 win over the Cleveland Indians on Monday night.
snippet: Jo-Jo Reyes won for the first time in 29 starts by throwing his first career complete game and Jayson Nix hit a two-run homer to lead the host Toronto Blue Jays to an 11-1 win over the Cleveland Indians on Monday night.
